name: Simple SH Tools
tagline: Install your favorite applications through a command via Ubuntu terminal.
body: Welcome to Simple SH Tools! ===================== Hello, see how easy it is to install any application through **Simple SH**, with one command you perform the installation of your application dependencies. ---------- **Run** ------------ Just run the following code in the terminal: cd ~/Downloads ; rm -rf simplesh-master/; wget -qO- -O simplesh.zip https://github.com/rafaelstz/simplesh/archive/master.zip; unzip simplesh.zip && rm simplesh.zip; cd simplesh-master/ ; clear; bash simple.sh; ---------- ** How can you help?** ------------ - Add new commands - Send me some proposals if you miss anything - Create issues if you find a bug or missing a feature. ---------- Developed by Rafael CorrÃªa Gomes Contact rafaelcgstz@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
